about.title: Who We Are
about.desc1: Our educational platform is designed to help you develop your skills in various fields such as programming, design, and digital creativity. We provide simple and easy-to-understand lessons suitable for all levels.
about.desc2: We believe that learning should be fun and interactive, so we focus on offering an enjoyable learning experience that allows you to study at your own pace and in your own way.

About.title: About Us
About.whoWeAreDesc: We are a modern academy dedicated to providing high-quality courses and resources for learners worldwide. Our goal is to make education accessible, engaging, and effective for everyone.
About.missionDesc: To empower students and professionals with the knowledge and skills they need to succeed in their careers and personal growth.

values.knowledgeDesc: We believe knowledge is power and the key to personal growth and success.
values.communityDesc: We foster a supportive learning community where students and teachers grow together.
values.excellenceDesc: We strive to deliver high-quality education and innovative teaching methods.

whyChooseUs.globalDesc: Learn from anywhere in the world with our online courses.
whyChooseUs.instructorsDesc: Learn from professionals with real-world experience.
whyChooseUs.resourcesDesc: Access a wide library of courses, notes, and exercises.
whyChooseUs.practicalDesc: Hands-on projects and real case studies to build skills.
